name: Teeth Seek Saga
description:
The rich old dude has every reason to be pissed since all his GOLDEN teeth fell off because of a stupid apple. You need to find all those teeth for him. He will take a #SELFIE# and post on social medias to grant your work! Just keep exploring.

FEATURES
* Swipe,tap,shake,shout to explore full game experience.
* MANY, i mean MANY fun and most popular mini games all in one. It’s like opening a ultimate Xmas gift.
* Easy and fun to play, yet Challenging to fully master.
* Get excited by finding out the rich dude shares your experience on his social media.

If you ever feel bored, just be ready and amazed by how fun this game can gets you. This teeth seek saga will quench your thirsty for fun. I am serious! That’s for real.

Are you a fan. If so then like us on our facebook page and follow us on twitter:
